name: AIR FORCE 1943
description:
This demo is our first project seeing the light of the day. Even though a web version is available, we HIGHLY suggest the downloadable version to have the full Air Force 1943 experience as intended.

All work was done remotely on Discord.


  • 1 level;
  • 1 boss;
  • 3 4K illustrations in free download;
  • Lots of nice frame by frame animations;
  • Cool music;
